amendment.description: Amendment places limits on the use of funds provided to the government of a foreign country for the purchase of goods made in a country other than such foreign country or the United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require foreign governments to use the funds appropriated in the bill for the purchase of American-made products, if no such product is manufactured in the recipient country, and if the purchase price of the American-made product is not more than 10% higher than a product made in another country.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Traficant amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 415 - 1 (Roll no. 213).
